ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed that when i get killed by a green monster i lose more compared to when i die by a red monster. Bizmatil ... From: Rand A. Babcock
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed that when i get killed by a green monster i lose more compared
to when i die by a red monster.

Bizmatil
-----Original Message-----
From: Rand A. Babcock <rbabcock@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:07 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


>From: "Rand A. Babcock" <rbabcock@...>
>
>It's it seems to me that this is the case. I have no empirical evidence
one way or the other, but I think it's accurate. When I get wacked by a
sand giant, I don't seem to loose as much as if a
>Lego or Mummy jumped me...
>
>Rand
>
>> From: scott@...
>>
>> I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the
monster that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many
levels below you, you loose more exp. Is this true?
>>
>> Azboklin the enchanter
